channel.title: Snail mail filesharing idea
channel.description: We all pass around a 500 gig external hard drive. Movie files and music files only. Fedex tracking and insurance always. Stealing the hard drive results in ban from mitb. Older CM members only.

item.title: Snail mail filesharing idea
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

Retarded. Simply, retarded. What benefit does this have over normal filesharing… costs of shipping… how many hours does it take for you to download a movie… not many. So why mail a physical hd around the place?

Read full topic

item.title: Snail mail filesharing idea
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

This idea is so stupid, lol, why spend tons of money of sending a stupid harddisk around the globe when we’ve got the internet? We might as well use a shared fileserver…

Read full topic

item.title: Snail mail filesharing idea
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

Ruler is right about DC++ (or WASTE or similar). For a small group, being able to browse someone’s entire music collection makes a lot more sense than striking blindly into a torrent site. Depends on what kind of project you want to run.

Side note, in regard to starting a torrent tracker: you might want to look into What.cd’s Project Gazelle.
edit: Looks like Gazelle is still far from release.

Read full topic

item.title: Snail mail filesharing idea
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:28, topic:210330”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=277225.msg2260730#msg2260730 date=1212648399]

[quote author=ruler link=topic=277225.msg2260699#msg2260699 date=1212642958]

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=277225.msg2260695#msg2260695 date=1212642573]

Wouldn’t it be easier buying a server with 500gb space and just ULing shit, that way no-one can steal it because it’s all done by FTP accounts.
[/quote]the general idea is that a group of friends share their stuff, ruler is just an idiot
[/quote]Yeah, across countries, which makes it retarded. Torrents is a way better idea. Much faster, more efficient, etc.

not for small groups which this CM is. Most cable users have 40KB up.
40KB a sec
2400KB a min
144000KB a hour
3456000KB a day
500000000KB every 144 days

500GB ~~ 500000000KB

[/quote]I have 300+kbs upload, omg…

bits or bytes?

stop arguing ruler, your idea has already been shot down

go fuck yourself

You deserve to fail out of school.

-big faggoty quote train-[/quote]

Camera Man

usuk, shutup

item.title: Snail mail filesharing idea
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:23, topic:210330”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=277225.msg2260524#msg2260524 date=1212625667]

[quote author=frank_ link=topic=277225.msg2260303#msg2260303 date=1212593852]

Wouldn’t it be easier buying a server with 500gb space and just ULing shit, that way no-one can steal it because it’s all done by FTP accounts.
[/quote]the general idea is that a group of friends share their stuff, ruler is just an idiot
[/quote]Yeah, across countries, which makes it retarded. Torrents is a way better idea. Much faster, more efficient, etc.

not for small groups which this CM is. Most cable users have 40KB up.
40KB a sec
2400KB a min
144000KB a hour
3456000KB a day
500000000KB every 144 days

500GB ~~ 500000000KB[/quote]And since you grab parts of torrents from groups of peers means you download faster, so you not only have one person uploading at 40kb/s you have more uploading, increasing the chance of someone having a higher upload.

edit: who said it’ll come preloaded with 500gb of that data instantly? who’s gonna do that? And torrents are also more efficient because multiple users at once can grab the data, instead of just one person getting it, a chance of forgetting to send it off for a day or two, send it… another few days goes by and the next person has it, etc…

The idea is only good if it’s with a group of friends close to you, I myself share my 400gb extern. every now and then… But wouldn’t dare ship it off to another country.

edit2: i’d rather share with the community in whole AS WELL, then just a few people here.

Read full topic
